name: Breathing
explain: Ensure a clear airway and maintain regular, unimpeded respiration by staying in environments with adequate oxygen levels.

name: Thirst
explain: the desire to replenish the body's water supply when it is depleted

name: Hunger
explain: desire to compensate for lack of energy or nutrients
things: banana,slices of bread,cereal,chocolate,bowl of dishes,syrup,condiment bottle,condiment pendulum,cooking pot,cupcake,cutlet,faucet,refrigerator,microwave,minced meat,oven tray,pie,dish,pudding,stove,toaster,table,cupcake,

name: Sleep
explain: desire to give the body and brain a rest through sleep

name: Laziness
explain: the desire to slack off or take it easy

name: Sensory
explain: desire for pleasure through stimulation of the senses

name: Sexual
explain: desire for sexuality
things: clothes pants,curtain,door,face cream,hair product,perfume,bed,light switch,nightstand,pillow,mobile phone,floor

name: Nursing
explain: the baby's need for breast milk

name: Emission
explain: the desire to expel unwanted substances from the body

name: Toxicity avoidance
explain: desire to avoid inoculation with toxic substances

name: Temperature
explain: Regulate body temperature by adjusting clothing, heating, cooling, or seeking appropriate shelter

name: Injury avoidance
explain: desire to avoid injury and pain

name: Acquisition
explain: desire to acquire possessions and property

name: Conservance
explain: to collect, repair, care for, and store things
things: soap,bathtub,deodorant,face cream,faucet,power,hanger socket,sink,toilet paper,toothbrush,toothpaste,towel,washing machine,cleaning,floor sponge,mirror,dishwasher,dishwashing liquid,refrigerator,ventilation fan,cleaning sponge,garbage

name: Order
explain: the need to keep things in order, organized, tidy, orderly, and neat
things: bathroom counter,closet,closet drawers,hanger,sink,towel rack,wall picture frame,cabinet,pile of clothes,wall,floor shelf,bookshelf,box,folder,refrigerator,kitchen cabinet,kitchen counter,kitchen table,rug,TV stand,garbage

name: Retention
explain: the desire to keep possession of things, to store them, not to lend them
things: soap,closet,closet drawers,power socket,toothpaste,toothbrush,face cream,perfume,deodorant,dishwashing liquid,folder,refrigerator,photo frame

name: Construction
explain: the desire to modify things in some way, to create something new

name: Play
explain: Engage in recreational activities or hobbies to relax and have fun

name: Cognizance
explain: Seek knowledge and understanding through learning, observation, or exploration

name: Exposition
explain: Share ideas, stories, or information with others to communicate and connect

name: Achievement
explain: Set and accomplish meaningful goals to feel a sense of progress and success

name: Exhibition
explain: Express yourself through art, performance, or other mediums to display talents or identity
things: mirror,soap,closet,closet drawers,clothes pants,pile of clothes,clothes shirt,deodorant,face cream,hair product,perfume,mobile phone

name: Nurturance
explain: Provide care and support to others to foster their well-being and growth
